name: WW domain containing transcription regulator 1

kegg.name: Hippo signaling pathway - multiple species - Homo sapiens (human)

reactome.name: EGR2 and SOX10-mediated initiation of Schwann cell myelination

summary: Enables transcription coactivator activity. Involved in several processes, including hippo signaling; positive regulation of cell differentiation; and regulation of signal transduction. Located in cytosol and nuclear body. [provided by Alliance of Genome Resources, Apr 2022]
